AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: master orgnium smith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Starting from a young age, [PAWN_nameDef] has apprenticed under some of the best smiths found on Pyandonea. Quickly surpassing [PAWN_possessive] mentors, [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked by King Orgnum himself to craft a new set of armour, an honour most never dreamed of. It's said the armour was strong enough to withstand the full might of a serpent's jaws, not that King Orgnum ever needed to worry about that.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: master buoyant steel smith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Always obsessed with what lies beneath the waves, one day [PAWN_nameDef] learnt of buoyant steel, a strange magical alloy, far lighter than it had any right to be. Ever since then [PAWN_pronoun] has worked towards becoming a master at working buoyant steel. This proved to be difficult, as buoyant steel is not easy to come by, but eventually [PAWN_nameDef] got there, crafting a cuirass that rivalled ebony in quality.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: master moonstone smith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: One of [PAWN_nameDef]'s ancestors was a rather skilled moonstone smith, back when the Maormer were still Aldmer. Though some has been lost to time, this knowledge has been passed down the generations, eventually being passed to [PAWN_nameDef].
